code: import React from"react";import _ from"lodash";import"bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css";var Pagination=function Pagination(props){var itemsCount=props.itemsCount,pageSize=props.pageSize,currentPage=props.currentPage;var pageCount=Math.ceil(itemsCount/pageSize);if(pageCount===1)return null;var pages=_.range(1,pageCount+1);return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("nav",{"aria-label":"Page navigation example"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("ul",{className:"pagination justify-content-left"},pages.map(function(page){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("li",{key:page,className:page===currentPage?"page-item active":"page-item"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("a",{className:"page-link",onClick:function onClick(){props.onPageChange(page);}},page));})));};export default Pagination;
